data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bocak, Ladislav (2018): Dexoris ruzzieri sp. nov. (Coleoptera: Lycidae), a new net-winged beetle from Ivory Coast. Zootaxa 4377 (1): 138-142, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4377.1.9|1 occurrence
